name: Tiny Town VR
description: Create an original world and fill it with buildings, roads, vehicles and more. Give it life with posable characters. Tell a story with custom speech bubbles and in-game photo captures. Then, share with friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, or Windows MR
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i3-6100, AMD FX4350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, or Windows MR
